title: (41400) Écija - Autovía del Sur

Things to keep in mind: -In the open field right next to it there is a bar-concert hall -On Wednesdays there is a market, so if you sleep there on a Tuesday you may not be able to leave until noon. The photo is from google maps because we didn't take a photo the same day and I made the post later... they recently built some public toilets, but I don't know the hours of these toilets

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

A dirt road with a deep moat on the right, pay attention when going down. We stopped at the first car park opposite, indicating "boarding area". Very quiet night and a wake alone in the world with a great view of the lake. Regarding the services, just a beach shower going down on foot to the lake.

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -
description: Very quiet place on the way to the campsite. The terrain is not flat everywhere but there is a good place for a 7.5m camper or 2-3 smaller campers. Part lake view. Environment not completely clean, but if everyone takes some garbage with them, it will be an even more beautiful place. Now and then you can hear the spitting of water from the dam. The road along the place is very quiet. No facilities available. 4G reception. we picked up 3 bags of garbage and took them with us. Hopefully it stays orderly now because it's a nice place. at night we also heard a wild boar rooting.

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title: (14720) Almodóvar del Río -

title_short: (41540) La Puebla de Cazalla - 22 Polígono Industrial los Pollitos
description: Spectacular motorhome pitch in an arabesque village 70km from Seville. Each station, well defined and with enough space between one camper and the other, is equipped with supply and disposal and a pillar for the electricity connection (both normal and Schuko). There are also bathrooms with toilets and showers with hot water. Everything is free, maximum length of stay 72 hours. There is a small bar where you can eat and drink until late.

From here you can visit the marsh and the northern Sierra de Sevilla

title: (14550) Montilla - Calle Cuesta de la Peña
title_short: (14550) Montilla - Calle Cuesta de la Peña
description: Official camper area next to the tourist bus stop. Splendid views. Service of water, draining (gray and toilet) Paseo Cervantes, next to the gardens

title: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - SE-146
title_short: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - SE-146
description: Parking at the watchtower, no ban on spending the night. Very nice view of the lake below.

title: (14029) Córdoba - 6 Carretera del Aeropuerto
description: Córdoba airport parking, to spend the night very quiet, no noise, no service, free Wifi Aena (civil aviation), if you park near the terminal, about 10 km from Cordoba. If you like skydiving or want to do a first flight, you can do it too.

title: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - Carretera Lora del Río
title_short: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - Carretera Lora del Río
description: Good views of the reservoir. Access from various roads. Close to the highway. Garbage container at the entrance. There are no services or facilities of anything, 100% nature. Be careful when leaving and entering, due to poor visibility from the road when having to be careful to scratch low and risk of vehicle collision

title: (41440) Lora del Río - 7 Calle Ciruelo
description: Motorhome area in Lora del Rio (Sevilla)

name: Camping Puebla
title: (41479) Camping Puebla
description: Beautiful, easily accessible and spacious campsite with good sanitary facilities, reception with a small shop, bar with a view, electricity connections on request. Fairly level stands. friendly staff. 15 euros per day, mobile home with 2 people. Electricity 5 euros per day. In summer the lake doesn't even come close!

title: (14005) Córdoba - 84a Carretera Palma del Río
description: Good petrol station next to the road, not immediately visible. Exit 50m before the construction industry. The spout has been sawn off. hose not possible

title: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - Carretera Lora del Río
title_short: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - Carretera Lora del Río
description: Parking by the lake. Shade under the trees. Very very quiet. No services. Free. Go down to the level of the wooden hut, dirt road suitable for vehicles. Night prohibited.

title: (41440) Setefilla -
description: A flat gravelled spot with wonderful views and in walking distance to the Ermitage Setefilla. Quiet during day and night, although one does hear the noise of passing cars. No services, no garbage bins, keep the area clean! Accesible for any type of vehicle, no limitations whatsoever.

title: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes -
description: Picnic air by the lake, magnificent view, peaceful, shaded, we can hear the cars a little, some rubbish on the ground, the guards came by in the morning and didn't tell us anything.

title: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - CO-5310
title_short: (41479) La Puebla de los Infantes - CO-5310
description: Superb lake very little frequented in the heart of the natural park. Several locations along the lake road allow parking and swimming below while keeping an eye on your vehicle. No prohibition sign but a priori it is forbidden to sleep there because it is a protected area. Beautiful day of swimming with breathtaking views. Almost no network.

title: (14830) Espejo -
description: Fantastic place to spend the night and enjoy the countryside in the winter or spring months next to the ruins of the Montemayor castle. In the summer months better not. There is a large spring water source with a lot of history too

title: (14193) Córdoba - Avenida Principal El Higuerón
description:
Parking spaces with electricity and water
Squares with water and emptying
Central squares with services


Parking for motorhomes and campers, located on a large plot in a quiet area perfect for resting, visiting Córdoba and Medina Azahara (since we are only 1.6 km from the archaeological complex) You have a bakery/cafeteria open every day, a 200m2 bus stop directly to the city center, cycle path and supermarkets open from Monday to Sunday. Reservations are not allowed and it is not necessary to notify your arrival. SEE INFORMATION UPON YOUR ARRIVAL IN THE OFFICE WINDOW.

title: (14005) Córdoba - N-437
description: Corner for picnic and night near the road. The natural corners are rare here!

title: (41440) Setefilla - Carr. Lora del Rio
description: Lat location to park a vehicle not too big, with a superb view. No services. Quite close to the quiet road, very quiet at night.

title: (41440) Setefilla - SE 6102
description: A separate place for a van, it might be too small for motorhomes. Only one place, the parking spot can be seen from the main road, very little traffic during the night. Really nice view of the lake, very calm. This place is really clean, so let’s leave it like that!

title: (41570) Badolatosa - 9 Carretera Casariche
description: Walkway wash

title: (41657) Los Corrales - A-378
description: Place on hill table and benches. Beautiful 360 degree view.

title: (14005) Córdoba - CO-3314
description: The Medina azahara car park, from where the buses leave to go to the site. Ample parking. Essential visit and watch the video in the visitor center.

title: (14005) - 21E Calle 6 Sg
description:
One of the few places where LPG - LPG. they have all adapters!
ATTENTION for the loading of the bottles need you the bottle base adapter I could not charge my french 13kg and my Woodruff... (70km detour for nothing)
No other service

title: (14005) Córdoba - Ctra. Palma Del Río km3,3
title_short: (14005) Córdoba - Ctra. Palma Del Río km3,3
description: Free parking, to spend the night if night falls, ample space

title: (41590) La Roda de Andalucía - A-92
description: Gas station with one euro water system

title: (41590) La Roda de Andalucía - SE-497
description: Here next to the gas station

title: (41590) La Roda de Andalucía - 58 Calle Estepa A.
title_short: (41590) La Roda de Andalucía - 58 Calle Estepa A.
description: Municipal parking .. next to the pools quiet place ... and shadows ... without services.

title: (14004) Córdoba - 704 Calle San Alberto Magno
description: Paid parking day and night

title: (14911) Jauja - 15D Calle Pleito
description: Parking beside the peaceful river genil. Day and night

name: KalmaChicha Natural Street Food
title: (14011) KalmaChicha Natural Street Food
description: Parking spot pure hikes and mountain bike tours in the heart of Sierra Morena. The owner is also the owner of the service station opposite, Mr. Juan is very friendly and offers a gas station, a small supermarket, butane and propane gas, drinking water and the best, a space totally integrated in the environment of nature to take a good coffee with beautiful muffins prepared in a traditional way by and with the recipe of the grandmother.

title: (14820) Córdoba - N-432
description: Small area with a few trees and picnic tables next to the N432 national road: ideal for taking a break. The place is separated from the road by a fairly high embankment so in case of repair I think we can stay there overnight without being bothered. (I haven't tested it.)

title: (41600) Urbanización Santa Elo - A-361
description: Recreational area, with some shadows. Easy access. ground parking

title: (14004) Córdoba - 25 Avenida del Aeropuerto
description: Washing with upper walkway

title: (14013) Córdoba - 74 Avenida de Cádiz
description: Drinking water.

title: (14005) Córdoba - 18 Prolongacion Avenida de Manolete
description: Online parking next to a park and a Mercadona. We stayed 2 nights. There is a lot of noise from the bus line at 50m. Line 7 to get closer to the center or 25min walk

title: (14004) Córdoba - 14 Calle Escritor Conde de Zamora
title_short: (14004) Córdoba - 14 Calle Escritor Conde de Zamora
description: Online parking area, ideal for motorhome. 16 minutes from the mosque. A quiet place with no problem being away from the center. 2 nights without problem

title: (14004) Córdoba - 4 Calle Escritor Castilla Agua
description: Parking very close to the zoo and 15 min walk from the Mezquita. Flat terrain. This is the university street.

title: (14004) Córdoba - 14 Calle Pintor Espinosa
description: Laundromat from the Speedqueen chain. Very clean and 10 minutes walk from the motorhome area (on the other side of the park). There is even a machine and a dryer reserved for animals.

title: (14004) Córdoba - 1 Avenida Linneo
description:
Parking of the Botanical Garden and the Zoo of Cordoba, we spent 2 very quiet nights. 15 minutes walk from the center
The street is active from 7:30 a.m.

title: (14005) Córdoba -
description: Laundromat

title: (14004) Córdoba - 720 Calle Pintor Espinosa
description: Free public parking. We arrived at it accompanied by the local Cordoba police and they told us that there were no problems for spending the night in it. During the day it is controlled by an association for the disabled who give you a ticket for one euro and spend the day. Very quiet and without problems to just sleep and visit the beautiful city of Cordoba. MANY THANKS TO THE LOCAL POLICE OF CORDOBA FOR THEIR HELP.

title: (14004) Córdoba - 1 Calle Manuel de la Haba
title_short: (14004) Córdoba - 1 Calle Manuel de la Haba
description: Cemetery car park with a small entrance ideal for visiting the city and spending one of the peaceful nights there

title: (41610) Paradas - A-92
description: Wide plain with some shade. It looks like it belongs to a restaurant that is closed. Right next to the highway. Ideal for stopover

title: (14009) Córdoba - 3P Calle Cordel de Écija
description:
Free quiet day/night parking near the city center.
To visit the historic center, prefer to walk up the Guadalquivir on foot for 500m towards the north, then cross the Roman bridge!

title: (41658) Martín de la Jara -
description: Area attached to the lagoon with access to vehicles without height limit. Beware of birds, there are flamingos in the lagoon. We slept very quietly for two nights, there are barbecues.

title: (14005) Córdoba - 6 Carretera Palma del Río
description: Lavomatic at the repsol petrol station. small bread and small things store

title: (14009) Córdoba - 8 Plaza de Andalucía
description: Nice and quiet place to park just a few motorhomes, there’s a sand floor park just behind but I’m adding the parking places in the street has they are free of charge. It’s very close to visit the Alcazar and the cathedral, you can walk there in less than 10 min. Quiet at night but noisy after 8 a.m.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 4 Avenida Granada
description: Laundry

title: (41610) Paradas - 22 Poligono los Alberos Vial 1
description: It is a family business with gas station, car wash and motorhome rental, they kindly assisted us at no cost to empty gray and black water and fill clean water. Recommended 100%

title: (14004) Córdoba - s/n Plaza de Vista Alegre
title_short: (14004) Córdoba - s/n Plaza de Vista Alegre
description: Local sports centre - we asked to use the showers and they let us in for free. Showers are relatively clean, and there is hot water. You push the button every 20 seconds or so for water, but temperature and pressure are good.

title: (14004) Córdoba - A-431
description:
Parking and service area with a steep incline. 20-30 minutes walk from the world famous Mesquita and 10 minutes walk from the historic center. Super central with a large, beautiful park just above (good for joggers and dog walkers). Jacks can compensate for the gradient. Balancing with wedges is much more difficult.
The first 10 minutes are free. After that, every minute is billed. Payment is by credit card.
There is no electricity on the pitches. There is an emergency power connection at the disposal station
Danger:
1) Not suitable for vehicles over 8.50 m.
2) The place is parceled out. If you use more than one plot, you pay twice! (Furniture, trailer or wrong parking). Pay attention to the boundaries of the parcel.
3) After paying, you have 5 minutes to leave. After that you have to pay !

title: (14005) Córdoba - Jose Maria Martorell
description: Laundry inside the shopping center, open on Saturdays and Sundays, as well as other typical services in shopping centers, including a service station with LPG and butane bottles.

title: (14011) Trassierra - Unnamed Road
description: Lonely turnaround at the end of a high road overlooking Córdoba.  Room for several vehicles.  Badly paved road.  Nearest residence is far away.  It seems like the only usage is parking for a trailhead to a seldom-used trail.

title: (14005) Córdoba - s/n Jose Maria Martorell
description: Repsol service station with six kilos of K6 butane cylinder

title: (14009) Córdoba - 21 Avenida Fray Albino
description: Online parking in a traffic area near the Roman bridge. Safe during the day because of the movement: pedestrians, police, etc. Noisy at night. Playground next door. ZONE WITHOUT VIGILES.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 1 Calle Islas Chafarinas
description: Land parking, flat and with the noise of the highway.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 12 Calle Altillo
description: 3 minutes walk from the center. is guarded by a guest who gives you 1 or 2 euros and the camper is very safe. superek to visit the town.

title: (14010) Córdoba -
description: A huge parking lot next to a sports stadium. this exacy location is under a bridge, next to a river. the bridge provides protection from the sun, so You can have a "siesta". The whole parking lot has plenty of waste containers. It gets quite busy and loud in the night, as people leave their homes to socialise after dark (it is simply too hot during the day)

title: (14004) Córdoba - 0 Calle Caballerizas Reales
description: Drinking water fountain, there are places to park just opposite, provide a jerrycan for filling.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 14 Calle Nuestro Padre Jesus de los REyes
title_short: (14009) Córdoba - 14 Calle Nuestro Padre Jesus de los REyes
description: Unofficial dirt parking. Exact GPS location flat behind a bus stop and next to a restaurant.

address.street: 14 Calle Nuestro Padre Jesus de los REyes

title: (14005) Córdoba - 23A Calle Francisco Gracia Trenas
description: A quiet, secure and calm place to stay the night, close to El Corte Inglés shopping. Residential area where it’s possible to jogging or ride a bike, also green parks nearby.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 4 Calle Isla Madeira
description: Speed Queen laundromat. No dogs allowed, but there are two hooks in front of the door where you can park your four-legged friend.

title: (14011) Santa María de Trassierra - 10P Calle Veneros de Bejarano
title_short: (14011) Santa María de Trassierra - 10P Calle Veneros de Bejarano
description: Public parking, easily accessible and from which you can go for a walk to visit the Popea Baths. Nearby there is a supermarket, pharmacy and a restaurant.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 5-7 Calle Acera de San Julián
title_short: (14009) Córdoba - 5-7 Calle Acera de San Julián
description: Ample place to park during the day when the rest of the car parks in the area are full.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 1 Plaza Tejar
description: Parking next to the Guadalquivir river, with a children's park next to the river, a Roman bridge and a Cordoba mosque 5 minutes away on foot.

title: (14009) Córdoba - 33 Calle Segunda de Miraflores
description: OK for one night, the location is great. We have a dog with us and were able to go for a great walk in the morning right by the river. The parking lot is fenced and quiet.

title: (41610) Paradas - A-92
description: Park in auto pista, with a lot of services a restaurant, and a karting race track. It has free park for veicules with less that 2.20m and park for trucks and vans.

title: (14010) Córdoba - Calle José Ramón García Fernández
title_short: (14010) Córdoba - Calle José Ramón García Fernández
description: Parking Arcángel Stadium, without services but very comfortable to spend the night.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 18P Calle Juan de Gortz
description: Quiet street to park the motorhome

title: (14010) Córdoba - Calle de la Guitarra
description: Quiet, large bus parking lot. Mobile homes are allowed, except during major events in the adjacent stadium. We spent a quiet night on a bank holiday in early December between around 20, mostly Spanish, mobile homes.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 131 Calle Arqueólogo García y Bellido
title_short: (14011) Córdoba - 131 Calle Arqueólogo García y Bellido
description: Land parking very close to the center. Stick with the bus station and train station, both of which have toilets.

title: (14010) Córdoba - 12 Calle Periodista José Luis de Córdoba
title_short: (14010) Córdoba - 12 Calle Periodista José Luis de Córdoba
description: Laundry and dryer service. Wi-Fi available free of charge. Laundry

address.street: 12 Calle Periodista José Luis de Córdoba

title: (14011) Córdoba - 1P Calle Dolores Ibárruri
description: Parking area in a park with games for children, benches, in the district which is an urbanization of calm apartments, with bars, workshops, benches. Bus stop nearby and 20 minutes from the center, or 30 minutes on foot, a street behind a Mercadona

title: (14010) Córdoba - 6 Calle Escritor Sebastián Cuevas
description: ? Parking space near the center of Córdoba (1.2km from Mezquita). There are also a number of campers for overnight stay.
